curam.util.persistence.helper

Interface EventDispatcherFactory<EVENT>

  • Type Parameters:
    EVENT - The type of event dispatched.

    public interface EventDispatcherFactory<EVENT>
    Stores a collection of listeners to be notified when an event occurs. Listeners must all implement the EVENT interface. Calling a method on the event interface returned by get(...) usually results in the same event being dispatched to all listeners.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
